content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

That's a great idea to research both PCGS and NGC, and even submit a few coins to each service to compare their processes and results. This will give you a better understanding of their services, and help you determine which one is the best fit for your needs.

Remember to also read reviews, ask for recommendations from fellow collectors, and check for accreditation and industry memberships (like ICTA and ANA) to ensure you're working with a reputable service.

When you do submit your coins, make sure to follow the submission guidelines carefully, and consider using a secure, trackable shipping method to ensure your coins arrive safely.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with getting your coins graded and slabbed, and I hope you're pleased with the results!

(And don't forget to display your coins proudly once they're graded and slabbed!)
